alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 12 at 9:16PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Park and east central Teton Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 915 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Moran Junction, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo Valley Ranch around 925 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Jackson Hole; Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains
